channel.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
channel.description:
[i]Sorry If this is in the wrong section I didnt know where else to post.[/i]
[center] I honestly dont know the reason why we havent been allowed to have them all this time. On nearly all the Rsps communitys I know, Members are allowed to have Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures and the fact this forum does not is part of the reason some people decide to favour those other communitys.
It takes away a certain element of freedom from the forum, restricting us to just our names and reputation. At times making the forum seem a little plain.
So i would like to see what everyone else thinks about it, I definitely think if most of the community is in favour of having Forum Avatars and Img Signatures, then they should at least consider it.[/center]
[i]
- Faded Vision[/i]

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

how about no…

this, it’s nice and ‘clean’ not having sigs & avatars on forums, sure now and then someone has a small avatar, but thats fine. (some of us australian and would still like to be around)

Read full topic

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

No. I posted a topic about it on MITB. All reasons were valid. Read through them and you’ll be like, good point.

Also, what reason do you need an avatar/signature picture for?

Read full topic
item.source: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

Avoid porno related pictures -
Make it so the user must submit their picture and if allowed, becomes set (only to be taken off, or it stays), and also, creat a option to disable sig’s so you can load the page faster, and the people who don’t care for time and etc, can still see the stuff they put work and time and effort into (NO SARCASM*****> not saying this site no work put into it).

Read full topic
item.source: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Pictures in siggies make everything confusing and annoying to see.

Read full topic
item.source: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Rich, post:2, topic:298510”]Avatars are allowed to higher ranked members (and respected), but I remember Moparisthebest posting the reason why, give me a second and I’ll find it.

edit:

Most people have stated the reason why avatars are not allowed. If you would like to see a real-life example head on over to sythe.org and look at just about any thread, it takes you 10x longer not only to load the page, but to sift through all of the stupid pictures to get to the actual content in the thread.

The forum looks much cleaner without images in avatars or signatures, and that is the way I want to keep it.

This was already discussed a few times, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,385582.0.html & http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381275.0.html[/quote]
pretty sure its community contributers and global mods+ that get avatars not respected members it works on user classes

Read full topic
item.source: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I think we should atleast have signatures, i like our avatars.

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

To much porn would be used as avatars to be moderated, people will post huge signatures, pages will take a shitlonger time to load, the site will look like shit.

PROTIP: A 12 YEAR OLD DOES NOT RUN THIS SITE LIKE ALL OF THE OTHERS.

Read full topic
item.source: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

You know, it doesn’t matter if the staff chooses to allow avatars. It wouldn’t happen for months, because the staff always has to have some other shit happen first to make ONE FUCKING MINOR CHANGE (Tutorial section…)

Anyways, perhaps there’s an add-on to enable and disable the ability to see avatars for a certain user (For example, Chassy could see avatars, but I can’t cause I set it to disabled)?

Read full topic
item.source: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?

item.title: Members should be allowed Forum Avatars and Picture Signatures?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

pk3r john:

I say you need at least 1k posts to make an avatar… that way you actually have to earn it.

Which brings in spam. It loads the pages slower as moparisthebest said, people would post pornographic images, and it would just create way too many problems.

Read full topic
